tool_description: Registers new domains with specified registrar, handles payment processing, and sets initial configuration.

domain_name.description: Full domain name to register (e.g., example.com)

registrant_phone.description: Phone number of registrant with country code

error_messages: Domain already registered: The requested domain is not available for registration.
Invalid registrant information: All registrant fields must be properly formatted and complete.
Invalid email format: Registrant email must be a valid email address.
Invalid phone format: Phone number must include country code and be properly formatted.
Payment failed: Registration payment could not be processed, check payment method.
Registrar error: Selected registrar is temporarily unavailable, try different registrar.
Invalid nameservers: Nameserver addresses must be valid hostnames or IP addresses.
usage: Provide domain name, registrar choice, registration period, and complete registrant information. Optionally configure privacy protection, auto-renewal, and custom nameservers.

registration_status.description: Status of domain registration (success, pending, failed)

domain_id.description: Unique identifier for the registered domain

expiration_date.description: Domain expiration date in ISO format
